definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: :v. 26) furnace (prob. loan-word from As. utûnu, atûnu, id. [also TelAm.], DHM:VOJ i.23 Buhl; Syr. 0atuwno0 hence Ar. 0’at=uwnun as loan-word Frä:26; Eth. 0ton: Di:763; conj. on etym. In K:§ 59 Anm. Lag:BN 111);—cstr. ´[[א]]: Da 3:6, Da 3:11, Da 3:15, Da 3:17, Da 3:20, Da 3:21, Da 3:23, Da 3:26, emph. [[אַתוּנָא]] Da 3:19, Da 3:22.
